attributes.additional_details: Petition for Sangat TV and presenter Upinder Randhawa , who provided a great amount of live footage (which news channels such as BBC and SKY failed to do so) of the Birmingham riots for people of all nationalites. They helped the police capture the rioters, which can all be proven with video footage http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5bdY6EzvrnA . For recognition of their work that was done completely for free and without complaint  , Sangat TV deserve an Award for the service they provided to 1000s of British people on-line and at home who are from all communities.
